item.title: Why would someone use Signal? What to know about the messaging app that Pete Hegseth and other Trump officials have relied on.
item.description: The chat app, which is run by a nonprofit foundation, has been downloaded 220 million times. Here’s what to know about Signal, including who owns it a...

item.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
item.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

item.title: Netflix wants to be a $1 trillion company. Earnings show why that’s a reasonable goal.
item.description: Analysts see Netflix generating growth even in a recession.

item.title: Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon. These strategies offer upside and downside protection.
item.description: Ed Yardeni argues that, to match the doom and gloom from Wall Street bears, the stock market would need to see a Lehman-esque meltdown.

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”
